level.text: Failure to comply with this Chapter may result in the penalties described in D.C. Official Code ยง 34-706 for failure to comply with Commission rules and regulations.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 56 DCR 7646 (September 25, 2009), incorporating text of Proposed Rulemaking published at 56 DCR 1827, 1847 (February 27, 2009).
